text: Cats & Dogs is a 2001 family action comedy movie of Talking Aninals with CGI Moving Mouths. It had a sequel called Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore (2010). ==Sources== ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:2000s family movies Category:2001 action movies Category:2001 comedy movies Category:2001 movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies about cats Category:Movies about dogs Category:American movies Category:Australian movies
title: Cats & Dogs
